They can make you self-centred, aggressive, dâ€¦
@TatMum_Blog @acraftycow @GraziaUK Yip! I earn way less. Always have. Wouldâ€™ve been different if Iâ€™d stayed in corporate world I dare say, and delayed kids or stayed childless.

@acraftycow @TatMum_Blog I think this woman is quite rare in having parents who could even consider bailing her out. I paid rent from 16, the moment I had a job. Maybe @GraziaUK are after the landed gentry market? Their story does not represent the young women I know at all....
@MarieGardiner @GraziaUK All I know is she is an outlier - an extremely rare one at that - to most women her age.

@TatMum_Blog @GraziaUK I honestly cannot think of one young woman I know at the moment who isnâ€™t scrambling against the odds to be independent, often exhausting themselves and never wasteful. @GraziaUK chose a bizarre story to tell, in this political climate.
